meanings: (불이) burn, blaze; (화염에 휩싸이다) be in flames, be aflame

examples.korean: The trees were ablaze with the colours of autumn. 발음듣기 나무들이 단풍이 들어 불타는 듯했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The trees were ablaze with the colours of autumn. 발음

examples.korean: A man was crawling away from the burning wreckage. 발음듣기 한 남자가 불타는 잔해 속에서 기어 나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A man was crawling away from the burning wreckage. 발음

examples.korean: The woods were aflame with autumn colours. 발음듣기 단풍이 들어 숲이 불타는 듯했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The woods were aflame with autumn colours. 발음

examples.korean: a burning desire to win 발음듣기 이기고 싶은 불타는 욕구 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a burning desire to win 발음

examples.korean: His burning ambition was to study medicine. 발음듣기 그의 불타는 포부는 의학을 공부하는 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His burning ambition was to study medicine. 발음
